tool_description: Manages content delivery network cache for media assets including cache invalidation, preloading, and status monitoring.

asset_urls.description: List of asset URLs to manage

operation.description: Cache operation: invalidate, preload, or check_status

priority.description: Operation priority: low, normal, or high

error_messages: Empty URL list: asset_urls cannot be empty and must contain valid HTTP(S) URLs.
Invalid operation: operation must be one of [invalidate, preload, check_status].
Invalid priority: priority must be one of [low, normal, high].
Invalid URLs: All URLs must be valid HTTP(S) addresses.
CDN service unavailable: Cache management service is temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide list of asset URLs and specify the cache operation. Use higher priority for time-sensitive operations.

operation_id.description: Unique identifier for the cache operation

failed_urls.description: Number of URLs that failed processing

cache_status.description: Cache status for each URL: cached, not_cached, or error

estimated_propagation.description: Estimated time for changes to propagate globally in minutes
